data.text: Asase nyinaa momfa ahosɛpɛw nteɛ mu mma Onyankopɔn!
Monto ne din anuonyamhyɛ ho dwom;
Munse Onyankopɔn sɛ, “Wo nneyɛe yɛ nwonwa dodo!
Asase nyinaa kotow wo;
Mommra mmɛhwɛ nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ;
Ɔmaa po yɛɛ asase kesee;
Ɔde ne tumi di hene daa daa,
Aman nyinaa, munhyira yɛn Nyankopɔn,
wahwɛ yɛn nkwa so
Na wo, Onyankopɔn, wosɔɔ yɛn hwɛe;
Wode yɛn koguu afiase
Womaa yɛn atamfo twiw faa yɛn so;
Mede ɔhyew afɔre bɛba wʼasɔredan mu
bɔ a mʼanofafa hyɛe, na mʼano kaa
Mede mmoa a wɔadɔ srade bɛbɔ afɔre ama wo;
Mommra mmetie, mo a musuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa;
Mede mʼano su frɛɛ no;
Sɛ mede bɔne hyɛɛ me koma mu a,
Nanso nokware, Onyankopɔn atie me,
Nhyira nka Onyankopɔn,
